name: Zines
description:
Invocation of Obscene Gods - "Volume one"
Awesome zine by Doug from Brody's Militia/Hellnation. A bunch of killer reviews and interview. Ft. The Kill/Nunslaughter/CSMD/Abigail/Rupture and Antiscene.

name: Tombs in the Valley Prod. Releases
description:
HORRIFIED - DEMO CD - LTD 50
3 TRACKS OF SICKENING DEATH METAL
£3

SHITNOISE BASTARDS/C3L - SPLIT TAPE!!! NNNNOOIIISSSEEEE/GRIND/ROCK N ROLL HELL!
£3


HUMAN JUNK/GODS AMERICA - "Gods Junk"
UK Hellnation Worship vs Crushing USA Powerviolence. £3.50

LORD FIST(FIN) 

White Tshirt. TSHIRT DESIGN IS THE AVATAR FOR THIS PART OF THE SHOP! £10  L. only one left!


MANIC SCUM - "Better Left Undead EP" CS
Repulsion worship from the US, awesome first release, nearly sold out! £3.50

SET ASIDE FOR GENOCIDE - "DEMO 2011"
USA Fastcore. £3.

LAST COPY!

UNHOLY GRAVE - WITCHING NEWCASTLE 7" LIVE FROM THE GRIND OVER THE UK TOUR WITH TOTAL FUCKING DESTRUCTION AND THE DEVILS. LTD 250. Red 100, Black 150

Nearly Sold out!

name: Distro Cassettes
description:
LIFEDECEIVER - "The Split Tracks".
Heavy Hardcore like Integrity. £3

LOCAL TRAP/KNIVES OUT - "Split"
Old School Hardcore/Fastcore. £3

PIZZAHIFIVE - "Live at The Funeral Home"
Ohio 2 piece grindcore! £3.50

REVENGEANCE - Demo £3
Awesome female/male fronted fastcore from Portugal.

REVENGEANCE/TINNITUS - Split £3
2 bands from Portugal. Fastcore/Grindnoise!

SAKATAT - "Live At Bloodshed 2012"
Turkish Mincecore! £3.

S.M.G./MOON-RA - "Split"
Grindcore/Sun-Ra Worship! £3.50

name: Distro Vinyl
description:
ANAL MASSAKER/2 MINUTA DREKA - "Split" £1
Legendary crustynoise/complete and utter shite.

ARCHAGATHUS/ONANIZER - Split 7" £3.50
Mincecore masters/sick cz grindcore!

BACK THEN - "Zeitverschwendung". Raging, now defunct, German Hardcore.

BLOODY PHOENIX/QUESTION - Split 7" £3.50
Awesome crust-grindcore/killer sloppy fastcore!

BRODYS MILITA "Cretin Slaughterhouse" 
Fast, Slow, Rock n Roll. Ex. Hellnation and what not. £4.

BRUTAL DEATH/SKRUPEL - "The revenge of the rough grind calamari rings"
BD were only a bunch of kids when they started, now dead, this is some well written old school grind homage/Skrupel, German legends, nothing else to say!

CEASE TO EXIST - "Heptaparaparshinokh"
Blackened UK Hardcore, maybe? i havent actually listen to it! 

CIRCLE OF DEAD CHILDREN - "Exotic Sense Decay" Pic Disc
Some old record by the US Brutal Death Band. £5

CSMD/SSS - "Split"
NOISE VS NOISEGRIND. £3.50

DEAD RADICAL/REPUBLICORPSE - "Split"
More fast US fastcore!

DEAD SEA FUCKING SCROLLS/HANGOVER HEARTATTACK - "Split" £2
Excellent release by two, now dead, UK fast hardcore/powerviolence, whatever. With artwork from Chris Narcosis.

ENABLER/DRAINLAND - "Split"
Well aye, just buy it! £3.50

EXTREME SMOKE 57/H-INCIDENT - "Split"
Two rubbish band names, but 2 great bands, total noise/grindcore destruction!

GET DESTROYED - "Shut in"
US Powerviolence! £3.50

I RESIGN - "No Prospect. No Amnesty" - US Hardcore.

I SHIT ON YOUR FACE/XXXMANIAK - "Split" £1
Brazilian gore/and some other country, American maybe?, gore.

JAZZFINGER/ULTRA SHIT INFERNO- "Split" 7"
UK noise legends Vs Uk useless noise non-legends. £5

KAOSPILOT - "For your safety...."
Awesome Norwegian Screamo.

LT. DAN/MAXIMUM THRASH - "Split"
Mincecore madness from Canada beating the shit outta Asian sloppy fastcore. £3.50

LYCANTHROPHY/FROM THE ASHES/AFTER THE LAST SKY/JOE PESCI - "4 Way Split"
CZs best, Swedens best, UKs worst. £4.
MANGLE/SUFFERINFUCK - Split 7" £3.50
2 raging UK band, all out GRINDCORE WAR!

MANNEQUIN/TRANSISTOR TRANSISTOR - "Split"
2 screamo type bands, from when this genre was actually good and not full of utter rubbish and any old metal band with screamed vocals being labelled as "screamo". Maroon Vinyl

NETWORK OF TERROR/E.C.F.C - "Split" - £2.00
some bassy 2 piecey powerviolency

NOISEAR - "Pyroclastic Annhiallation" LP
US GRINDCORE!

PLF/DOWNTRODDEN - "Split" - Amazing USA Grindcore Vs Raw Grind from Serbia. £3.50

PROLETAR/GREBER - "Split" - Asian Mincegrind/Canadian Bastards!

PROTESTANT - "1st EP"
Old Distro stock. First outing from main dude from HALO OF FlLIES RECORDS. Crusty/Heavy Hardcore! Nice screen printed cover!

ROBOT ATTACK - "Demo no. Three Point Zero"
USA Hardcore band from a while ago, this is old distro stock, pretty interesting band. Comes on nice blue vinyl

ROBOT ATTACK/HYPATIA - "Split"
More Robot Attack backed with some other band i cant remember hearing, but RA are worth buying this for alone. So maybe Hypatia will be a nice surprise for you 

RUPTURE - "Spontaneous Simian Combustion"
Another release by the OZ Scumbags! £3.50

SEPPUKU/NECROCUM - "Split"
Complete noisecore destruction. £3.50

SHEEVA YOGA - "Svet ten cert vem" 12"
Mad CZ grindcore/noise/jazz. £5.

SHITSTORM/THE GENTLE ART OF CHOKIN - "Split"
Brtual split between two extreme grindcore bands. £3.50

SKULLS AND FLAMES - "R.I.P". 10" Gatefold.
Swansong from Dutch Crossover thrashers! £4.

S.M.G/DAISYCUTTER - "Split"
Raw Malaysian grindcore Vs. Crust/Grind from the US.

SNAKE HEAD FISH - "S/T"
20 tracks of totally trailblazing fastcore, wizzing along in no time at all. Nice first 7"!

SOIL OF IGNORANCE/WADGE - Split 7" £3.50
Brutal Grindcore/Drum Machine Madness

SUFFERING MIND/NEON HOLE 
SM are the Polish answer to Lycanthrophy, which means they are amazing! NH are USA crusty/grindy stuff. Clear Vinyl

TERLARANG/OVER THE TOP - "Split 7"
White or Black vinyl, thrash off!

TOTES BRUTES - 7". 
Short, Fast and Loud! Ltd 300. £3.50

URINE COP - 7" £4.25
True noisecore from Last Days of Humanity, Column of Heaven members. ltd to 250 copies(i think)

VALHALLA PACIFISTS/PRUMYSLOVA SMRT - "Split" 12"
UK Ds-13 rip off/Cz thrash. £5.

VIOLENT GORGE/DISPEPSIAA - VG Destroy with 1 side of harsh grind/noise/mince/gore Vs. Brazilian old school grindcore.

options.name: LYCANTHROPHY/FROM THE ASHES/AFTER THE LAST SKY/JOE PESCI

name: Distro CDs
description:
CAVE IN - "Tides Of Tomorrow"
One of the EPs before they got signed to a major then dropped. £5

CITY OF CATERPILLAR - "Demo & Live Recording"
That band who formed outta PG.99. £5.

COLLISION - "Roadkiller"
Dutch Thrash/Death/Grind bastards! £5.

EIBON/HANGMAN'S CHAIR - "split"
2 absolutely crushing French stoner/sludge bands.

ELIMINATOR - "We Rule The Night"
Debut Ep from UK Traditional Heavy Metal Mullets. £5.

FORDELL RESEARCH UNIT - "The Illusion Of Movement"
NOISE. £5

IRON MAN - "Black Night"
One of the best US Classic Heavy Metal bands. If you like Black Sabbath, Pentagram, Witchfinder General etc you NEED THIS! Re-mastered for extra METAL HEAVYNESS £6.66

IRON MAN - I Have Returned
Its IRON MAN! Prime US HEAVY METAL! £6.66

JESUS PHILBIN - "Subterranean Electronic Blasphemy"
Chris Dodge of Spazz fame doing noise. Still sealed. £5

JOE PESCI/ONANIZER - "split" £3.00
60 track rage fest between 2 good friends. Bunch of released/sold out tracks and new ones too.

LOOKING FOR AN ANSWER - "buscando una respuesta"
Spanish Grindcore, one of the best! £7

PROTESTANT - "as dead as we look"
Old distro stock. Killer USA Crust/Hardcore band.

RITUAL - "Widow"
Formed in the early '70s, Ritual didnt release this, the bands debut album, until 1983. A raging raw classic piece of early 70's heavy rock and early 80s NWOBHM. If you find yourself swinging in your room to bands like Angel Witch, Quartz, Diamond Head and Holocaust, you NEED THIS! £6.66

SINISTER REALM - "S/T"
Debut album from Ex. Pale Divine man, John Gaffney. Outstanding Heavy/Doom Metal, its time to 'bang ya balls off! £6.66

S.M.G. - "The HOTRS Sessions"
Ltd Raw recordings from MAL grindcore bastards! /150. £7

SMALL DOSES COMP - "VA"
100 tracks of grindcore, fastcore, noisecore etc etc £6.66

SYLVESTER STALINE - "$$ Gonna Spread Hard Drugs...."
French Fastcore, 33 tracks of madness. £5

TERMINAL SOUND SYSTEM - "?"
Some boring noise thing on Release(Relapse Records side label). Promo Copy. £2

THE ABANDONED HEARTS CLUB - "The Initial Confessions...."
Math Tech/Metal thing from ages ago! £3.

THE HAND OF DOOM - Posionoise
Mad Germany Proto Metal/Punk/NWOBHM(influenced) from 1979. Absolutley crazy release, smashing down boundaries, FFO Discharge, Sarcofago, Motorhead, Early Priest, Accept, The Stooges etc. £6.66

WHITE EYES - "beastmode" £6
Insane German grindcore, with ALOT of latter day Discordance Axis influences.

VAI TE FODER - Full Length Cd - ltd 200. 
"Crust-Hardcore(80s).Metal". £5
